Back to Reality, Fun Verboten

02 January 2007

We're back from Berlin, and back to work. I'll write a bit more about the trip later today, but some of the photos are up on Flickr.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
